tool_description: Predicts peak electricity demand periods and magnitudes using advanced forecasting models and weather correlations.

base_demand_forecast.description: Base demand forecast array in MW

prediction_horizon.description: Prediction horizon: daily, weekly, or monthly

peak_threshold_percentile.description: Percentile threshold for peak identification (90 to 99)

include_emergency_reserves.description: Include emergency reserve requirements in predictions

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must have equal lengths.
Invalid prediction horizon: Use daily, weekly, or monthly.
Invalid threshold percentile: Must be between 90 and 99.
Invalid confidence level: Must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
Insufficient historical data: Need minimum 30 days of historical peak patterns.
usage: Provide base_demand_forecast, weather_forecasts, and historical_peak_patterns arrays. Optionally set prediction_horizon, peak_threshold_percentile, confidence_level, and emergency reserve flag. Returns peak demand predictions with timing and magnitude.

peak_duration_hours.description: Expected duration of peak period in hours
